snippet: Skyworks’ chief said he expected savings of $75 million from combining the companies, part of a broader consolidation in the industry.
abstract: DealBook Online; computer chip maker Skyworks Solutions agrees to purchase fellow semiconductor company PMC-Sierra for $2 billion.

headline.main: Skyworks to Buy PMC-Sierra for $2 Billion in Merger of Chip Makers
